title: Champion Mastery Accumulation
body:
I like to play a bunch of Normals in order to grind IP so I can buy champions and I decided recently to change things up, I'd try to get atleast level 1 mastery on every champion.

I now sit on 157 mastery points. Just curious how many other people have.


EDIT: For those curious.
4 level 5's
2 level 4's
6 level 3's
21 level 2's
69 level 1's

Only 24 champions in the game I don't have atleast rank 1 on (but I own any of them)

I have rank 1 mastery on 16 champions I don't own (playing them in free week) and I think its kinda dumb. I think you should have to own the champion to unlock the mastery points.
